Description: POISSONNIER: There you are! I have something exquisite for you. You must sample some. NAVIGATOR: Please... don't. POISSONNIER: It must have migrated via the Gant Pole. A magnificent specimin. See, when I press this dorsal gland: so! It emits a gant jus of its own concoction! NAVIGATOR: Excuse me. I find I have no appetite.
Name: Overheard at Zee: Rare Meats
